description:
A few days have passed since Ichijou Hotaru transferred to Asahigaoka Branch School, and she`s continuously surprised by how different it is from her old school. In her unique classroom shared by grade school and middle school students, she`s invited to play a game of "drop-the-ruler." She doesn`t know the rules, but as the game goes on, the excitement grows... Later, as Hotaru is reflecting on all her new experiences, Komari invites her to go look at the stars. Everyone agrees to go together, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On est allées voir les étoiles
We Went to Look at the Stars
Wir sahen uns die Sterne an
